scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache networks/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.mainnet.yaml && mustache networks/mainnet.json constants.template.ts src/constants/generated.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache networks/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.goerli.yaml && mustache networks/goerli.json constants.template.ts src/constants/generated.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-prize-pool-mainnet subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-prize-pool-mainnet subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.all-goerli:studio: yarn clean && yarn prepare:goerli && yarn gen:goerli && yarn deploy:goerli:studio
scripts.all-mainnet:hosted: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:hosted
scripts.all-mainnet:decentralized: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:decentralized
